steps.title: Call for airway expert help
steps.step:
Look, listen & feel at the mouth and tracheostomy stoma
Use waveform capnography if available
steps.ssml: <speak> Call for airway expert help<break time="400ms"/>Look, listen and feel at the mouth and tracheostomy</speak>

steps.step:
Standard ORAL airway manoeuvres
Cover the stoma (swabs / hands)
steps.ssml: <speak>Standard<emphasis level="strong">ORAL airway</emphasis><break time="500ms"/>Cover the stoma (swabs / hands)</speak>
